verses.verse: And it came to pass after <WH310> the plague <WH4046>, that Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH5375> the sum <WH7218> of all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, all that are able to go <WH3318> forth to war <WH6635> in Israel <WH3478>.
And Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> spake <WH1696> with them in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559>,

Take the sum of the people <WH6242>, from twenty years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>; as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that came forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

Reuben <WH7205>, the first-born <WH1060> of Israel <WH3478>; the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>: of Hanoch <WH2585>, the family <WH4940> of the Hanochites <WH2599>; of Pallu <WH6396>, the family <WH4940> of the Palluites <WH6384>;
of Hezron <WH2696>, the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites <WH2697>; of Carmi <WH3756>, the family <WH4940> of the Carmites <WH3757>.

These are the families <WH4940> of the Reubenites <WH7206>; and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were forty <WH705> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Pallu <WH6396>: Eliab <WH446>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>: Nemuel <WH5241>, and Dathan <WH1885>, and Abiram <WH48>. These are that Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, who were called <WH7148> of the congregation <WH5712>, who strove <WH5327> against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175> in the company <WH5712> of Korah <WH7141>, when they strove <WH5327> against Jehovah <WH3068>,

and the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> its mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104> together with Korah <WH7141>, when that company <WH5712> died <WH4194>; what time the fire <WH784> devoured <WH398> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men <WH376>, and they became a sign <WH5251>.
Notwithstanding <WH1121>, the sons of Korah <WH7141> died not <WH4191>.

The sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> after their families <WH4940>: of Nemuel <WH5241>, the family <WH4940> of the Nemuelites <WH5242>; of Jamin <WH3226>, the family <WH4940> of the Jaminites <WH3228>; of Jachin <WH3199>, the family <WH4940> of the Jachinites <WH3200>;
of Zerah <WH2226>, the family <WH4940> of the Zerahites <WH2227>; of Shaul <WH7586>, the family <WH4940> of the Shaulites <WH7587>.
These are the families <WH4940> of the Simeonites <WH8099>, twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

The sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> after their families <WH4940>: of Zephon <WH6827>, the family <WH4940> of the Zephonites <WH6831>; of Haggi <WH2291>, the family <WH4940> of the Haggites <WH2291>; of Shuni <WH7764>, the family <WH4940> of the Shunites <WH7765>;
of Ozni <WH244>, the family <WH4940> of the Oznites <WH244>; of Eri <WH6179>, the family <WH4940> of the Erites <WH6180>;
of Arod <WH720>, the family <WH4940> of the Arodites <WH722>; of Areli <WH692>, the family <WH4940> of the Arelites <WH692>.
These are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH705>, forty thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.
The sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>: Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209>; and Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> after their families <WH4940> were <WH7956>: of Shelah, the family <WH4940> of the Shelanites <WH8024>; of Perez <WH6557>, the family <WH4940> of the Perezites <WH6558>; of Zerah <WH2226>, the family <WH4940> of the Zerahites <WH2227>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> were <WH2696>: of Hezron, the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites <WH2697>; of Hamul <WH2538>, the family <WH4940> of the Hamulites <WH2539>.
These are the families <WH4940> of Judah <WH3063> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH7657>, threescore and sixteen thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.
The sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> after their families <WH4940>: of Tola <WH8439>, the family <WH4940> of the Tolaites <WH8440>; of Puvah <WH6312>, the family <WH4940> of the Punites <WH6324>;
of Jashub <WH3437>, the family <WH4940> of the Jashubites <WH3432>; of Shimron <WH8110>, the family <WH4940> of the Shimronites <WH8117>.
These are the families <WH4940> of Issachar <WH3485> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH8346>, threescore and four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967>.

The sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> after their families <WH4940>: of Sered <WH5624>, the family <WH4940> of the Seredites <WH5625>; of Elon <WH356>, the family <WH4940> of the Elonites <WH440>; of Jahleel <WH3177>, the family <WH4940> of the Jahleelites <WH3178>.
These are the families <WH4940> of the Zebulunites <WH2075> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH8346>, threescore thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.
The sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> after their families <WH4940>: Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim <WH669>.

The sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>: of Machir <WH4353>, the family <WH4940> of the Machirites <WH4354>; and Machir <WH4353> begat <WH3205> Gilead <WH1568>; of Gilead <WH1568>, the family <WH4940> of the Gileadites <WH1569>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>: of Iezer <WH372>, the family <WH4940> of the Iezerites <WH373>; of Helek <WH2507>, the family <WH4940> of the Helekites <WH2516>;
and of Asriel <WH844>, the family <WH4940> of the Asrielites <WH845>; and of Shechem <WH7928>, the family <WH4940> of the Shechemites <WH7930>;
and of Shemida <WH8061>, the family <WH4940> of the Shemidaites <WH8062>; and of Hepher <WH2660>, the family <WH4940> of the Hepherites <WH2662>.

And Zelophehad <WH6765> the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660> had no sons <WH1121>, but daughters <WH1323>: and the names <WH8034> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> were Mahlah <WH4244>, and Noah <WH5270>, Hoglah <WH2295>, Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.
These are the families <WH4940> of Manasseh <WH4519>; and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were fifty <WH2572> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>.

These are the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> after their families <WH4940>: of Shuthelah <WH7803>, the family <WH4940> of the Shuthelahites <WH8364>; of Becher <WH1071>, the family <WH4940> of the Becherites <WH1076>; of Tahan <WH8465>, the family <WH4940> of the Tahanites <WH8470>.
And these are the sons <WH1121> of Shuthelah <WH7803>: of Eran <WH6197>, the family <WH4940> of the Eranites <WH6198>.

These are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH7970>, thirty and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>. These are the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> after their families <WH4940>.

The sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> after their families <WH4940>: of Bela <WH1106>, the family <WH4940> of the Belaites <WH1108>; of Ashbel <WH788>, the family <WH4940> of the Ashbelites <WH789>; of Ahiram <WH297>, the family <WH4940> of the Ahiramites <WH298>;
of Shephupham <WH8197>, the family <WH4940> of the Shuphamites <WH7781>; of Hupham <WH2349>, the family <WH4940> of the Huphamites <WH2350>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Bela <WH1106> were Ard <WH714> and Naaman <WH5283>: of Ard <WH4940>, the family of the Ardites <WH716>; of Naaman <WH5283>, the family <WH4940> of the Naamites <WH5280>.

These are the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> after their families <WH4940>; and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.

These are the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> after their families <WH4940>: of Shuham <WH7748>, the family <WH4940> of the Shuhamites <WH7749>. These are the families <WH4940> of Dan <WH1835> after their families <WH4940>.

All the families <WH4940> of the Shuhamites <WH7749>, according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH8346>, were threescore and four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

The sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> after their families <WH4940>: of Imnah <WH3232>, the family <WH4940> of the Imnites <WH3232>; of Ishvi <WH4940>, the family of the Ishvites <WH3441>; of Beriah <WH1283>, the family <WH4940> of the Berites <WH1284>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Beriah <WH1283>: of Heber <WH2268>, the family <WH4940> of the Heberites <WH2277>; of Malchiel <WH4439>, the family <WH4940> of the Malchielites <WH4440>.
And the name <WH8034> of the daughter <WH1323> of Asher <WH836> was Serah <WH8294>.

These are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH2572>, fifty and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

The sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> after their families <WH4940>: of Jahzeel <WH3183>, the family <WH4940> of the Jahzeelites <WH3184>; of Guni <WH1476>, the family <WH4940> of the Gunites <WH1477>;
of Jezer <WH3337>, the family <WH4940> of the Jezerites <WH3340>; of Shillem <WH8006>, the family <WH4940> of the Shillemites <WH8016>.

These are the families <WH4940> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>; and they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

These are they that were numbered <WH6485> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> and a thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Unto these the land <WH776> shall be divided <WH2505> for an inheritance <WH5159> according to the number <WH4557> of names <WH8034>.

To the more <WH7235> thou shalt give the more <WH7235> inheritance <WH5159>, and to the fewer <WH4592> thou shalt give the less <WH4591> inheritance <WH5159>: to every one <WH376> according <WH6310> to those that were numbered <WH6485> of him shall his inheritance <WH5159> be given <WH5414>.
Notwithstanding <WH776>, the land shall be divided <WH2505> by lot <WH1486>: according to the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> they shall inherit <WH5157>.
According <WH6310> to the lot <WH1486> shall their inheritance <WH5159> be divided <WH2505> between the more <WH7227> and the fewer <WH4592>.

And these are they that were numbered <WH6485> of the Levites <WH3881> after their families <WH4940>: of Gershon <WH1648>, the family <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649>; of Kohath <WH6955>, the family <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956>; of Merari <WH4847>, the family <WH4940> of the Merarites <WH4848>.

These are the families <WH4940> of Levi <WH3881>: the family <WH4940> of the Libnites <WH3846>, the family <WH4940> of the Hebronites <WH2276>, the family <WH4940> of the Mahlites <WH4250>, the family <WH4940> of the Mushites <WH4188>, the family <WH4940> of the Korahites <WH7145>. And Kohath <WH6955> begat <WH3205> Amram <WH6019>.

And the name <WH8034> of Amram <WH6019>'s wife <WH802> was Jochebed <WH3115>, the daughter <WH1323> of Levi <WH3878>, who was born <WH3205> to Levi <WH3878> in Egypt <WH4714>: and she bare <WH3205> unto Amram <WH6019> Aaron <WH175> and Moses <WH4872>, and Miriam <WH4813> their sister <WH269>.
And unto Aaron <WH175> were born <WH3205> Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385>.
And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died <WH4191>, when they offered <WH7126> strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.

And they that were numbered <WH6485> of them were twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505>, every male <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>: for they were not numbered <WH6485> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, because there was no inheritance <WH5159> given <WH5414> them among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

These are they that were numbered <WH6485> by Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, who numbered <WH6485> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405>.

But among these there was not a man <WH376> of them that were numbered <WH6485> by Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, who numbered <WH6485> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> had said <WH559> of them <WH4191>, They shall surely die <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057>. And there was not left <WH3498> a man <WH376> of them <WH3612>, save Caleb the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.
